title: Fantasy Idle Tycoon 2
description: Fantasy Idle Tycoon 2 is a clicker idle game where you are tasked to build an empire with the help of your crew of trusted blacksmiths. The game features classic management gameplayâ€”build, expand, and dominate, all the while unlocking upgrades to help you grow even faster. This game is ideal for players who want to experience slow and calming satisfaction from idle gaming.
